title: Night Crossings Book 1 Cadan's Dream
description: Cadan, unaware that he can astral travel at nights when he sleeps, astral travels one night and finds himself in another world. There, he meets a mysterious stranger who lives in an old castle near dangerous lurking phantoms.Martikh is upset at first of Cadan’s unwanted and abrupt presence that he locks Cadan up in a room. Cadan’s screams torture him as he tries to sleep that he goes back to the locked bedroom.He watches the young man lying on the bed, thinking of other ways of dealing with him. But, the young man’s panic attacks worry him so much that instead, he starts warming up to him…
author: Jake Anders
